issues.description: Hero benefit grid uses generic 'Delegate Tasks' without explaining what tasks or to whom - fails to differentiate from any VA service
issues.rationale: Small business owners need specificity about what delegation means for their unique needs

issues.description: 'Operating system' tagline is tech jargon that small business owners won't connect with emotionally or understand practically
issues.rationale: Target audience needs human, relatable language not enterprise software metaphors

issues.description: Control fears section immediately after hero creates negative frame before establishing positive value - poor psychological sequencing
issues.rationale: Leading with objections before benefits established reduces conversion potential

issues.description: Pricing FAQ uses defensive questions like 'Why this price?' which validates price resistance instead of reframing value
issues.rationale: Questions should guide toward value recognition not justify defensive positions

issues.description: 'Not Included' column draws attention to limitations before users understand core value - creates doubt prematurely
issues.rationale: Negative framing before positive value establishment hurts conversion psychology

issues.description: 'Best for Founders' vs 'Best for Growing Teams' creates false dichotomy - many small businesses are both
issues.rationale: Segmentation labels exclude rather than include potential customers

issues.description: Proof bar placement above fold pushes actual value prop down, making users work to understand what you do
issues.rationale: Social proof without context of what service provides creates confusion

issues.description: 3-column pricing comparison with 'show all features' toggle implies complexity that scares small business owners
issues.rationale: Target audience wants simplicity not enterprise-style feature matrices

issues.description: No mention of ROI, time savings, or revenue impact - focuses on features not business outcomes
issues.rationale: Small business owners buy outcomes not features or processes

issues.description: Missing urgency or scarcity messaging - no reason to act now vs perpetual consideration
issues.rationale: Without urgency drivers, small businesses defer decisions indefinitely

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace 'Delegate Tasks' with '10+ Hours Back Weekly' showing specific time ROI with supporting metrics
suggestedFixes.rationale: Concrete time savings resonate more than vague delegation promises

suggestedFixes.fix: Change tagline to 'Your business's extra pair of hands' - human, relatable, immediately understood
suggestedFixes.rationale: Small business owners relate to needing help not software systems

suggestedFixes.fix: Move control section after testimonials - let social proof establish trust before addressing concerns
suggestedFixes.rationale: Positive frame first, then address concerns from position of strength

suggestedFixes.fix: Reframe FAQ: 'How clients save 3X their investment' focusing on ROI stories not price defense
suggestedFixes.rationale: Shift conversation from cost to investment return

suggestedFixes.fix: Replace 'Not Included' with 'Add-On Services' positioned as growth opportunities not limitations
suggestedFixes.rationale: Positive framing maintains momentum toward conversion

suggestedFixes.fix: Use revenue-based labels: 'Under $500K', '$500K-$2M', '$2M+' for clearer self-identification
suggestedFixes.rationale: Revenue bands are objective and inclusive segmentation

suggestedFixes.fix: Move proof bar below headline but above subhead - context then credibility sequence
suggestedFixes.rationale: Users need to know what you do before caring who uses you

suggestedFixes.fix: Show only 3 key differentiators per tier with 'See details' link - simplify decision matrix
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduce cognitive load for overwhelmed small business owners

suggestedFixes.fix: Add outcome metrics: 'Average client grows 23% faster' with case study link
suggestedFixes.rationale: Business growth metrics drive purchase decisions

suggestedFixes.fix: Add 'Limited spots available this month' with countdown to create decision urgency
suggestedFixes.rationale: Scarcity drives action in perpetually busy small business owners
